result.execSummary:
The defendant Uno Richard Bloom was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Uno Richard Bloom is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Uno Richard Bloom was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Edward Minser, DF ATTY: James T. Remington, DF: Uno Richard Bloom appeared from jail. Court called at 11:21 a.m.  Set for Probation Review Hearing.  Includes case 14CF293 & 14CM322.  Court has received and reviewed the letter from Molly O'Keefe.  Probation is recommending  the DE stay and finish his current jail time of 45 days and then be sent to a treatment facility like Arbor Place in Menomonie.  Attorney Remington makes statement.  Court questions the DE.  DE makes statement.  Court orders 45 days in the St. Croix County Jail with credit for 32 days served.  Court adjourned at 11:38 a.m. lw

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Francis D. Collins, DF ATTY: James T. Remington, DF: Uno Richard Bloom appeared.  Court called at 1:29 p.m.  DE files Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights Form with the Court.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads No Contest to Ct 2 in 14CF293.  DE pleads No Contest to Ct. 2 in 14CM322.  Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights.  Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 2 in 14CF293 and Guilty of Ct. 2 in 14CM322. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct. 1 & Ct. 3 in 14CF293 and Ct. 1 in 14CM322. Victim rights have been complied with.  Sentencing arguments.  DE makes statement.  Crt orders:

CT. 2 in 14CF293
S/W 2 years probabtion with conditions
-  AODA with follow through with any recommended therapy or treatment
-  Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
- Report to probation by today 01/26/15 
- Court costs of $243 and $200 for DNA Surcharge on Ct. 2 of  14CF293 through DOC
- Court costs of $243 and $200 for DNA Surcharge on Ct. 2 of  14CM322 through DOC
- 20 days to appeal

CT. 2 in 14CM322 concurrent to Ct. 2 in 14CF293
S/W 2 years probabtion with conditions
-  AODA with follow through with any recommended therapy or treatment
-  Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
- Random and regular testing
- Report to probation by today 01/26/15 
- Court costs of $243 and $200 for DNA Surcharge on Ct. 2 of  14CF293 through DOC
- Court costs of $243 and $200 for DNA Surcharge on Ct. 2 of  14CM322 through DOC
- 20 days to appeal

Bond remains in effect until DE has signed up for probation

ADDRESS INFO for Uno Richard Bloom

Prior: 225 N. Green Ave, New Richmond, WI 54017 United States

filed by ADA Alexis McKinley. eif
Pre-trial conference on September 26, 2014 at 09:30 am.

*AMENDED*
Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.  

*It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Joyce K.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

*It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Sarah E.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Fox, ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley, DF ATTY:  James T. Remington, DF:  Uno Richard Bloom appeared. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  Def pleads not guilty on all three counts.  Waives speedy trial. Bond review. Atty Remington states that def has gone through an AODA for an OWI 1st ( in River Falls, WI). Mr. Bloom to participate in in-patient treatment, beginning tonite - 8/19/14. It is requested to amend a no contact with SE. Court amends bond.

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Sarah E. or Joyce K.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
